firstNightReminder: If the closest evil player is in a clockwise direction, point your finger horizontally in that direction. If the closest player is in an anti-clockwise direction, point your finger horizontally in that direction. If the two closest evil players are equidistant, point your finger horizontally in either direction.
name: Shugenja
ability: You start knowing if your closest evil player is clockwise or anti-clockwise. If equidistant, this info is arbitrary.

firstNightReminder: Choose a character type. Point to a player whose character is of that type. Place the Balloonist's 'Seen' reminder next to that character.
otherNightReminder: Point to a player whose character is different than the character type of the player marked with the 'Seen' reminder. Move the 'Seen' reminder next to that character.
name: Balloonist
ability: Each night, you learn a player of a different character type than last night. [+0 or +1 Outsider]

name: Banshee
ability: If the Demon kills you, all players learn this. From now on, you may nominate twice per day and vote twice per nomination.

firstNightReminder: Wake the Summoner and show them three not-in-play character tokens.
otherNightReminder: If the Summoner has a 'Night 3' reminder. Wake the Summoner. They point at a player, and to a Demon icon on the character sheet. Put the Summoner to sleep. Wake the chosen player. Show the 'You are' card, the thumbs down evil sign, and the Demon token. Replace their character token with the Demon token and put the new Demon to sleep.
name: Summoner
ability: You get 3 bluffs. On the 3rd night, choose a player: they become an evil Demon of your choice. [No Demon]

firstNightReminder: While setting up the game, remove all Minion tokens and add Townsfolk or Outsider tokens. Wake the appropriate number of players directly clockwise and anti-clockwise from the Lord Of Typhon. Show each of these players a unique Minion token, and give a thumbs down. Replace these players' good character tokens with these Minion tokens and put these players to sleep.
otherNightReminder: The Lord of Typhon points to a player. That player dies.
name: Lord Of Typhon
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [Evil characters are sat in a line. You are in the middle. +1 Minion. -? to +? Outisders]
